ComicInfo.Letterer: Emilio Bautista,Jamie Parreno,Jeremy Sullivan,Kelly Tindall,Kelly Tindall
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:37:01 [Issue ID 4000-442451] urn:comicvine:4000-442451 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 18:23:09. [Issue ID 1174424]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The finale to the explosive second arc is here! The city is on its knees, manipulated into causing its own destruction... and only Fillmore Press can save them now.
Note: Some digital retailers released the digital edition (1/15/2014) for this issue before the print edition (1/22/2014).
ComicInfo.Title: Our Fires Burn Bright
